name: hisat2_simulate_reads.py
usage:
hisat2_simulate_reads.py [-h] [-d] [--single-end] [-r READ_LEN] [-f FRAG_LEN] [-n NUM_FRAG]
                         [-e EXPR_PROFILE] [--repeat-info REPEAT_FNAME] [--error-rate ERROR_RATE]
                         [--max-mismatch MAX_MISMATCH] [--random-seed RANDOM_SEED] [--snp-prob SNP_PROB]
                         [--sanity-check] [-v] [--version]
                         [genome_file] [gtf_file] [snp_file] [base_fname]

options.description: show this help message and exit
expression profile: flux or constant (default: flux)
max mismatches due to sequencing errors (default: 3)
probability of a read including a snp when the read spans the snp ranging from 0.0 to 1.0 (default: 1.0)
also print some statistics to stderr
show program's version number and exit
